Text:
how does it really work? do I need a version of gta on my psp memorystick?
Or can I now buy GTA and play it but still play downloaded games?
I´m not 100% sure, but i think you need a homebrew copy of gta. More info at http://pspupdates.qj.net/

You need GTA:LCS to use this. The one you bought from the store. If you have a version on your mem stick, and can play it, you probably don't need to use this eboot in the first place. I just tested it, works great.
Ok, the loader is not the best you can get, but now when the "code" is broken, I think there will be more loaders in just a few weeks ;)
Does it work whit other games? Like socom games and stuff? like does it work whit other games at all? or is it GTA only? =/
It works with other games. Here is a list with working games. http://www.fanjita.org/content/gta_working.html
om jag har fattat rätt så kan man ladda ner spel till ditt psp med 2.60? eller e jag helt botra
Om du undrar om man kan använda den här emulatorn på 2,6 så vet jag inte, men allt bygger på att du har en version av GTA
